name: SQL-simplifier
short_description:
This is a test project, it features the SQL-simplifier library made by me. This is a very simple library using the LGPL license (See source file). The library simplifies communicating with an SQL database.

Since the project is under the LGPL license, any projects to which the source code will be visible to the end user must indicate (Such as by keeping the licensing comment in the source file) the license. 

However, projects where the source code will not be visible by the end user (Standard software projects, and projects which use the complied .DLL for this library) do not need to include licensing. (This text is a rough summary, and is not intended to replace the license, in the event this contradicts the license the license is to be taken as the truth)
summary: A quick test project for a C# library.
